description:
Variation/removal of condition 2 (drawing numbers) of planning application reference P112840 dated 16/5/2013 (Appeal allowed reference  APP/V5570/A/12/2186119) to allow for the following minor amendments:
• Slight alteration to the site slopes and level differences incorporated into the plans, elevations and sections to allow level access to ground floors from Charlotte Terrace
• Roof build-up heights, external walls and party walls thicknesses increased to achieve U-levels required for Level 4 and to achieve Building Regulations acoustic requirements for separating walls
• Changes to windows and external doors related to internal layout adjustments
• Minor changes to terraces to meet Building Regulations.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 16/5/16.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 16/5/13 [LBI ref: 112840    Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
